entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 3:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy

Visibility: 32 km

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with periods of ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with snow in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
